verses.text: "Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves, for the rights of all who are destitute.
Speak up and judge fairly; defend the rights of the poor and needy." Epilogue: The Wife of Noble Character

rsbNotes.title: Pr 31:8–9
rsbNotes.text: 31:8, 9 The king’s task is to uphold righteousness in society. In Israel, this task was viewed in the context of the covenant with the Lord (Deut. 17:14–20).
